mapper.update: update t_proprietor_market tm set tm.remove = 1 where tm.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_proprietor_market tm left join t_proprietor_market_category tpmc on tm.category_id = tpmc.category_id left join t_proprietor_market_label tpml on tm.label_id = tpml.label_id left join t_user tu on tm.uid = tu.uid left join t_community tc on tc.id = tm.community_id where tm.remove = 0 and tm.shield = 1

select tm.id, tm.community_id , tm.uid as uid, tm.goods_name as goodsName, tm.price, tm.goods_explain as goodsExplain, tm.negotiable, tm.state, tm.category_id as categoryId,tm.label_id as labelId, tm.remove, tm.click as click, tm.phone as phone,tm.images as images,tm.shield as shield, tm.deleted as deleted, tm.create_time as createTime,tm.update_time as updateTime, tpml.label as labelName,tpmc.category as categoryName,tu.real_name as realName,tc.name as communityName from t_proprietor_market tm left join t_proprietor_market_category tpmc on tm.category_id = tpmc.category_id left join t_proprietor_market_label tpml on tm.label_id = tpml.label_id left join t_user tu on tm.uid = tu.uid left join t_community tc on tc.id = tm.community_id where tm.remove = 0 and tm.shield = 1 limit #{page},#{size}
select count(0) from t_proprietor_market where category_id = #{categoryId} and deleted = 0
